definition: Zhou Dynasty/Western Zhou 西周 (1046-771 BC) and Eastern Zhou 東周|东周 (770-221 BC)
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
morning

sentences.english: In the Zhou Dynasty, the people celebrated the Mid-Autumn Festival to worship the moon.
sentences.chinese: 在周朝，人們開始慶祝仲秋並拜月。

sentences.english: The motifs are classic Chinese ones that are variations on themes that go all the way back to Zhou dynasty bronzes .
sentences.chinese: 圖案是典型的中國式，以周朝青銅器上的圖案爲遠祖。

sentences.english: The origin of the military finance in the Han Dynasty can trace back to the Zhou Dynasty, and it consummated in the Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 漢代軍事財政的淵源可溯及到周朝，至秦已比較完善。

sentences.english: Jiang helped King Wen and his son turn over the Shang Dynasty and establish the Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 姜子牙協助文王及其子推翻商朝，建立周朝。

sentences.english: Lao tze optimum weeks, will ask ritual in Lao tze.
sentences.chinese: 孔子到周朝國都雒邑，打算向老子請教禮的知識。

sentences.english: The tune "Da Wa" is the badge of music in zhou dynasty.
In China, merchants had used advertisements to attract people since Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，商人從周朝開始就用廣告來吸引人們。

sentences.english: The ancestors of the zhou dynasty, and the north of ManYi have close relationship.
sentences.chinese: 周朝的祖先，也和北方的蠻夷有密切的關係。

sentences.english: The Chou period was also important because of its great teacher, Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 周朝也因偉大的教師孔子而變爲很重要。

sentences.english: Pingyao of Shanxi Province was built 2000 years ago during the Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 山西平遙古城建於2000年前的周朝。

sentences.english: The dance dates back to the Zhou dynasty, more than 2-thousand years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這種舞蹈追溯到2千多年前的周朝。

sentences.english: Wooden attendants stood watch in a Zhou king's tomb in Liangdai centuries before the terra cotta army was created.
sentences.chinese: 周朝帝王墓穴中出土的木傭，比兵馬俑早了幾個世紀。

sentences.english: Chau conferred great gifts, and the good were enriched.
sentences.chinese: 周朝大封諸侯，使善人都富貴起來。

sentences.english: Pingyao of Sha recentxi Province was put together 2000 years bair conditioning unitkwardsduring the Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 上海中級口譯山西平遙古城建於2000年前的周朝。

Qin Dynasty (221-207 BC)
the state of Chu, one of the most important of the small states contending for power in China between 770 and 223 BC, located around present-day Hubei
